channel.title: [Not a bug] Weird Reaper/Noble death bug
channel.description:
####What happened? In a gameplay, I, as a Noble was apparently Reaped but insted of me showing up dead, it was my other Noble comrade. **However**, i was talking in dead chat but didn't appear to be dead on the 'action phase' of the chat, nor the names/numbers list. So, the Reaper did get his target correct but the display of the actions that took place were more then misleading.
**Screenshots:** http://imgur.com/a/ykD4P
http://imgur.com/a/GePvC
**Note:** William Forde never spoke to me, so maybe he was afk. Perhaps he couldn't see the chat, or that me and him were the same person (Same role, different names)?
####What was SUPPOSED to happen? •My name was supposed to be highlighted in **red** next to the skull, not William Forde's name. •The end game screen displays both **Andrew Atlee's**(Me) and **William Forde's** names in 'green', indicating that we were alive when **I** clearly wasn't. So, appearence issue most likely? Seems like it, though I'm not sure if it's a problem with the Reaper or Nobles. I haven't experience this kind of problem with the Noble role before.
####Steps to reproduce: Coding, mumbojumbo. XD
####Comments: I'm not sure if anyone else have had this issue before. I don't want to spam the ReportBug section, but I feel every little helps, and i want this game to be smooth and clean of ugly imperfections like the one i've experienced. :)
